title: Placement Games
body:
Hey Riot Games, 
I won 9 out of 10 Placement games and got put in bronze 3. I heard form many other people with same or less wins that they all got put in Bronze 3.
I wanna ask if this is getting fixed or that Placement games are just useless now.
Thanks you, 
Mercedesman69{{item:3070}}

replies.body: What MMR did you have? what rank did you finish at? These all determine the position you get after placements during a new season.
I was switching between silver 4 and silver 5. I think I finished as silver 5
